edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration

Class RepliconfigurableReconfiguratorDB<NodeIDType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.AbstractReplicaCoordinator<NodeIDType>
      • edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.PaxosReplicaCoordinator<NodeIDType>
        • edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.RepliconfigurableReconfiguratorDB<NodeIDType>
  • Type Parameters:
    NodeIDType -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Application, AppRequestParser, AppRequestParserBytes, Replicable, Reconfigurable, ReplicaCoordinator<NodeIDType>, Repliconfigurable

    public class RepliconfigurableReconfiguratorDB<NodeIDType>
extends PaxosReplicaCoordinator<NodeIDType>
    Author:
    V. Arun

    We need this class to extend both PaxosReplicationCoordinator and AbstractReconfiguratorDB, so we use an interface for the latter.

      • getReconfigurationRecord

        public ReconfigurationRecord<NodeIDType> getReconfigurationRecord(java.lang.String name)
        Allows uncoordinated access to DB state. In-memory "DB" could also allow outsiders to modify DB state through returned references, which is problematic unless the returned values are deep copied.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        ReconfigurationRecord for name.

      • isRCGroupName

        public boolean isRCGroupName(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if RC group name is name itself by consulting the soft copy of node config. We could also have checked if the name is node.toString() for some node in the current set of reconfigurators.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        True if name represents a reconfigurator group name.

      • getRCGroupName

        public final java.lang.String getRCGroupName(NodeIDType node)
        RC group name of node is just node.toString(). Changing it to anything else will break code.
        Parameters:
        node -
        Returns:
        String form of node.
